author: Staff Reporter
text:
Police personnel nabbed four persons, who were involved in betting during the Twenty20 cricket match between India and Pakistan on Saturday evening.

Abdul Shuban (38) of Karugambathur, Babu (31) of Makkan, V. Karthik (35) of Kosapet and Elias (23) of Konavattam and four others were watching the ICC World Twenty20 match at a shop in Burma Bazaar.

Police said they were betting for an amount of Rs. 100 to Rs. 200.

Following information, police personnel attached to Vellore North station went to the spot and nabbed the four. Four others fled from the spot.

They have been booked under the Tamil Nadu Gambling Act, police said.
title: Four held for betting during India-Pak match
